titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the Thompson, S. mss., 1911-1976
titlepage.publisher: Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana
titlepage.p: © 2003 Trustees of Indiana University. All rights reserved.

did.head: Summary Information
did.abstract: Collection consists of the papers of Stith Thompson, 1885-1976, including correspondence; writings by Thompson; biographical and autobiographical materials such as travel files and diaries; materials relating to professional societies and conferences to which he belonged and attended; and family genealogies on which he worked over the years.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Usage Restrictions
userestrict.p: Prior arrangements are not necessary before coming to the Library, however, patrons from out of town are encouraged to communicate with the Library in advance of their visits to ascertain availability of materials.
Photocopying permitted only with permission of the Curator of Manuscripts, Lilly Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item], Thompson, S. mss., Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Professor of English and Folklore at Indiana University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of the papers of Stith Thompson, 1885-1976, including correspondence; writings by Thompson; biographical and autobiographical materials such as travel files and diaries; materials relating to professional societies and conferences to which he belonged and attended; and family genealogies on which he worked over the years.
Manuscripts index in the Lilly Library includes entries at the item level.

arrangement.head: Arrangement/Organization
arrangement.p: Collection is organized in seven series: I. Correspondence, II. Writings, III. Biographical Materials, IV. Societies and Conferences, V. Genealogies, VI. Printed Materials, and VII Additions.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in IUCAT, the IU Libraries' online catalog. Materials about related topics, persons or places can be found by searching the catalog using these terms.

scopecontent.p: The Correspondence series is arranged chronologically as well as alphabetically.
